body:
Hi Mostapha,

Annual Daylight simulations take hours to be done, I am working with Rhino 5 64-bit and trace_dc.exe is 32-bit, is there a way the plunging can be installed in 64-bit to be able to use all my CPU's for the simulations? Any other way you recommend to work around thins will be great too.



Thanks!

Blanca
